item.title: Ray add a quote by Lama Surya Das
item.description: "Other people can’t cause us to be impatient unless we let them do so. In other words, others don’t make us impatient. We make ourselves impatient, through our expectations and demands, fixated attachments and stuckness." -- Lama Surya Das

item.title: Ray add a quote by Jack Kornfield
item.description: "Peace requires us to surrender our illusions of control. We can love and care for others but we cannot possess our children, lovers, family, or friends. We can assist them, pray for them, and wish them well, yet in the end their happiness and suffering depend on their thoughts and actions, not on our wishes." -- Jack Kornfield

item.title: Ray add a quote by Jack Kornfield
item.description: "Even Socrates, who lived a very frugal and simple life, loved to go to the market. When his students asked about this, he replied, "I love to go and see all the things I am happy without." -- Jack Kornfield

item.title: Ray add a quote by Ayya Khema
item.description: "If we divide into two camps--even into violent and the nonviolent--and stand in one camp while attacking the other, the world will never have peace. We will always blame and condemn those we feel are responsible for wars and social injustice, without recognizing the degree of violence within ourselves. We must work on ourselves and also with those we condemn if we want to have a real impact. " -- Ayya Khema

item.title: Ray add a quote by Shunryu Suzuki
item.description: "Treat every moment as your last. It is not preparation for something else." -- Shunryu Suzuki
